amendment.description: To provide for the development and dissemination of evidence-based best practices for health care professionals to recognize victims of a severe form of trafficking and respond to such individuals appropriately, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 308 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Cassidy. (consideration: CR S2333-2337; text: CR S2334-2335) To provide for the development and dissemination of evidence-based best practices for health care professionals to recognize victims of a severe form of trafficking and respond to such individuals appropriately, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 308 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Cassidy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
